INSERT INTO mission_eval ( missionid, uid, comment, userscore, creationdate ) VALUES ( #{missionid}, #{uid}, #{commentv}, #{userscore}, now() );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: select mi.typeid,mt.previewimg,mt.description, mt.name as missiontype, count(*) as missioncount, ( select count(*) from usermission umi, mission smi where umi.missionid = smi.missionid and smi.typeid = mt.typeid ) as usercount from mission_type mt, mission mi where mt.typeid = mi.typeid group by mt.name,mi.typeid,mt.previewimg,mt.description order by mi.typeid
